comments.content: The second one is [Corinthian Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20080926145418/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=EF.100640.0.1), stretched horizontally a bit.
